name: light-that-burns-the-sky
effect: Inflicts damage using either Attack or Special Attack stat, whichever is higher. Determining which stat is used takes into account stat changes but not held items or abilities.

flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
This attack inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage—
whichever stat is higher for the user, Necrozma. 
This move ignores the target’s Ability.
flavor_text_entries.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
This attack inflicts Attack or Sp. Atk damage—
whichever stat is higher for the user, Necrozma.
This move ignores the target’s Ability.
flavor_text_entries.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.
